headline: Does Chubb’s New Chubb Benefits Brand Sharpen Its Supplemental Insurance Strategy or Blur Its Focus (CB)?
summary: In early January 2026, Combined Insurance Company of America, a Chubb company, launched the Chubb Benefits brand, consolidating its supplemental and workplace benefits operations under a unified identity with new logos, colors and digital assets across North America. This rebranding tightens the link between Chubb’s global franchise and its supplemental insurance offerings, aiming to create a more cohesive experience for employers, individuals and distribution partners. We’ll now examine how...
